parameters.command:
=#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

# --- Configuration from upstream nodes ---
IDENTIFIER="{{ $json.identifier }}"
ISSUE_ID="{{ $json.identifier }}"
TITLE="{{ $json.title }}"
PROJECT_PATH="{{ $json._config.projectPath }}"
AUTOPILOT_PATH="{{ $json._config.autopilotPath }}"
PROJECT_NAME="{{ $json._config.projectName }}"
TECH_STACK="{{ $json._config.techStack }}"
TEST_COMMAND="{{ $json._config.testCommand }}"
LINT_COMMAND="{{ $json._config.lintCommand }}"
DONE_STATE="Done"
BLOCKED_STATE="Blocked"
TIMEOUT="{{ $json._config.timeoutSeconds }}"

# --- Read the executor prompt template and substitute variables ---
PROMPT_TEMPLATE=$(cat "${AUTOPILOT_PATH}/prompts/executor.md")

# Perform variable substitution
PROMPT=$(echo "$PROMPT_TEMPLATE" | \
  sed "s|{{ISSUE_ID}}|${ISSUE_ID}|g" | \
  sed "s|{{PROJECT_NAME}}|${PROJECT_NAME}|g" | \
  sed "s|{{TECH_STACK}}|${TECH_STACK}|g" | \
  sed "s|{{TEST_COMMAND}}|${TEST_COMMAND}|g" | \
  sed "s|{{LINT_COMMAND}}|${LINT_COMMAND}|g" | \
  sed "s|{{DONE_STATE}}|${DONE_STATE}|g" | \
  sed "s|{{BLOCKED_STATE}}|${BLOCKED_STATE}|g")

echo "[executor] Starting: ${IDENTIFIER} — ${TITLE}"
echo "[executor] Worktree: autopilot/${IDENTIFIER}"
echo "[executor] Timeout: ${TIMEOUT}s"

# --- Run Claude Code ---
cd "${PROJECT_PATH}"
timeout "${TIMEOUT}" claude \
  --worktree "autopilot/${IDENTIFIER}" \
  -p "${PROMPT}" \
  --print \
  2>&1 || EXIT_CODE=$?

EXIT_CODE=${EXIT_CODE:-0}

if [ "$EXIT_CODE" -eq 124 ]; then
  echo "[executor] TIMEOUT after ${TIMEOUT}s"
elif [ "$EXIT_CODE" -ne 0 ]; then
  echo "[executor] FAILED with exit code ${EXIT_CODE}"
else
  echo "[executor] SUCCESS"
fi

exit $EXIT_CODE
